txt.en: Your efforts within Tham Mírdain have not gone unnoticed by the Elves of Rivendell. Because of your unceasing aid in the defence of Tham Mírdain, they have bestown upon you the title of Marshal.
Protect Tham Mírdain against the encroaching evil
The ancient Ring-forges at Tham Mírdain must be purged of the vile presence of Saruman's minions.
